wpt.name: GCZRRG
wpt.desc: One Degree of Separation: WWCD by WWCD, Traditional Cache (2.5/1.5)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: One Degree of Separation: WWCD
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
This cache was hidden as part of the One Degree of Separation Geocaching Project.
This is a seed that came from: CacheAbel's - Lettie (GCWBKV)by NetworkCacher
The cache:
Your typical hide -- in a shopping center. The cache is a micro and contains only a log. BYOP. Spring and Summer difficulty is higher than in the Winter.
Congratulations to CliffMcC31 on the FTF
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:encoded_hints: Don't let this one stump you. It is on the shopping center side; you can park within two feet.

groundspeak:log.groundspeak:text: Found it at night. Good thing I keep a flashlight handy. TFTC
